body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Thank you","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" to all our sponsors and community for making the 2017 Open Source Hardware Summit what it is! We could not do this annually without your continued support.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We have 2017 OHSummit images online at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.flickr.com/photos/open_hardware_summit/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"our flickr site ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"and we have our 2017 OHSummit video available at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://vimeo.com/user14106369"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"vimeo","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Since the 2013 Open Hardware Summit at MIT, Addie Wagenknecht has chaired the Summit and served on the board of the organization.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We're kicking off the day with a keynote from Pamela Liou before moving in to a full day of programming. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We have Laura James speaking on hardware for disaster relief, Shah Selbe on the use of ecological IoT and National Geographic, Stefanie Wuschitz talking about making artistic technology, Kashif Ali on open source hardware for cellular access and a panel on engineering open source.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Plus eight more speakers presenting on their unique projects and experiences in oshw!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
